text: How many objects instances can you create from a class?
answers: Infinitely many object instances can be created from one class.
Only one object can be created per class.
You can only create a set number of objects per class, this number is defined in the class.
You can create only one object instance per constructor in the class.

text: Which of the following determines the functions of an object
Which of the following sets up an instance of the object
How many constructors can a class have
answers: Two, the default constructor and some overloaded constructor
Zero, classes don't have constructors, only objects do.

text: How many constructors does a class NEED to have
answers: Zero, the class does not necessarily have to create an object
Two, the default constructor and some overloaded constructor
Three, the default constructor some overloaded constructor and a super constructor

text: What is the constructor that does not have any parameters and sets the class variables to their default value
